event_title: Endgame: Duchamp, chess and the avant-garde
event_text: Endgame. Duchamp, chess and the avant-garde is an account of twentieth-century avant-garde movements up to the beginning of conceptual art, told from the angle of what appears to be a minor anecdote: the game of chess.
event_link: about  "Endgame: Duchamp, chess and the avant-garde"
